marketplaces.name: colony-plugins
marketplaces.description: Task decomposition and parallel execution plugins for Claude Code

files.README.md:
# Colony

> ## This repository has been deprecated
>
> **Colony has moved to [mattheworiordan/powerups](https://github.com/mattheworiordan/powerups).**
>
> All future development, bug fixes, and releases happen there. This repo is archived and will not receive updates.

---

## New location

Colony now lives at **[github.com/mattheworiordan/powerups/plugins/colony](https://github.com/mattheworiordan/powerups/tree/main/plugins/colony)**.

### Install via the Powerups marketplace

```bash
# Add the marketplace (one-time)
/plugin marketplace add mattheworiordan/powerups

# Install Colony
/plugin install colony@powerups-marketplace
```

### Full documentation

- [Colony README](https://github.com/mattheworiordan/powerups/blob/main/plugins/colony/README.md)
- [Powerups repo](https://github.com/mattheworiordan/powerups) (includes Colony, Counsel, Domain Search, Worktree, and more)

---

**Built by [Matthew O'Riordan](https://github.com/mattheworiordan)**, CEO at [Ably](https://ably.com)

plugins.name: colony
plugins.description: Decompose complex tasks into parallel sub-tasks with independent verification
